reviews.review:
Better than csgo
No cheaters
Good community 
Many cool servers
It is a really fun game, I'd recommend it as a retro experience for CS:GO players. But all the servers in EU which have players are mostly DM.

Still enjoyable in 2019. It doesn't have useless skins, graffiti are free and unlimited, tons of gamemodes and it's still supported by the community. Buy if you want some classic CS.

It's a really good quality game if you think of a lot of games I've played so far and this game is so old.It's a game that will really deeply impress you with its epic maps, sound and images.As with other games of CS, this is a nice game.You can get even more pleasure by playing the game with your friends.Have fun, everyone.
This is such a cool game, it brings back the good old times of cs.I would completely recommend this game because it's awesome and fun to play!
